/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's view of the surroundings. The road itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a canopy overhead. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. In the distance, you can see buildings peeking through the foliage, adding a touch of urbanity to the otherwise natural landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a unique perspective, making the viewer feel as if they are part of the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
